channel.title: Cultural Events on NRRWA
channel.description: Recent content in Cultural Events on NRRWA

item.title: Rajyotsava Celebrations 2025
item.description: Every year, we celebrate Kannada Rajyotsava! This year, we have many cultural activities and competitions culminating with the main event on 23rd.

item.title: Annual Cultural Festival 2024
item.description: Join us for our grand annual cultural festival featuring music, dance, and traditional performances!
